title: White Frost (Acoustic)
lyrics:
White frost on the horizon
I lost nearly my mind
Having no one beside me but pining
I bear the loss
Having let mother nature define me

We paid the cost



We were a committee

We still vote, you and I

Isn't it a pity what's lost

In the meridian of time?



It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you

It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you



White frost on the horizon

I once covered our heart



Having no even temper confided

I bear the loss

I'd been living a nation divided

Deeper the cost



Summon the committee

We still vote with an aye

Isn't it a pity we lost

We're the idiots of time



It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you

It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you



I've been living a nation divided

We bear the loss

Having let mother nature define me

Deeper the cost



It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you

It's your touch

It's your touch

It's you
